caller-path

Get the path of the caller function

Install 

$ npm install --save caller-path

Usage 

// foo.js
const callerPath = require('caller-path');

module.exports = () => {
	console.log(callerPath());
	//=> '/Users/sindresorhus/dev/unicorn/bar.js'
}

// bar.js
const foo = require('./foo');
foo();
